content:
Public stream created by Patrick Massot. Description:

Formalization of physics, chemistry, biology...
@everyone Please note that, after discussion among the maintainers, I just created a new stream specifically dedicated to natural sciences in Lean. I moved the Boyle law discussion.
Patrick Massot Thanks for creating this stream!

I subscribed people who were active in this discussion but of course everybody should feel free to unsubscribe and, more importantly, review the subscriber list and tell people I forgot that they should subscribe.
